name: Home Between Worlds
description:
In this game you play as a little girl in her pijamas as Aliens attack her home. She needs to shoo the aliens away before they take over her home. 

GameJam 2019

Francisco Santos: Development/ Story Artist/ Animator/ Game Design
João Massalana : Programer/ Game Design
JasonMorgado : Concept Art/ Ilustrator/ Animator/ Sound/ Music
Rafael Capinha : Concept Art/ Background Artist
Rita Faria: Animation/ Development
